vernac_cmds: Require Import Nnat ZArith_base Lia ZArithRing Zdiv Morphisms.
Lemma Zrem_0_r a : Z.rem a 0 = a.
Hint Resolve Zrem_0_l Zrem_0_r Zquot_0_l Zquot_0_r Z.quot_1_r Z.rem_1_r : zarith.
Ltac zero_or_not a := destruct (Z.eq_decidable a 0) as [->|?]; [rewrite ?Zquot_0_l, ?Zrem_0_l, ?Zquot_0_r, ?Zrem_0_r; auto with zarith|].
Lemma Z_rem_same a : Z.rem a a = 0.
Lemma Z_rem_mult a b : Z.rem (a*b) b = 0.
Theorem Zrem_opp_l a b : Z.rem (-a) b = -(Z.rem a b).
Theorem Zrem_opp_r a b : Z.rem a (-b) = Z.rem a b.
Theorem Zrem_opp_opp a b : Z.rem (-a) (-b) = -(Z.rem a b).
Theorem Zrem_sgn a b : 0 <= Z.sgn (Z.rem a b) * Z.sgn a.
Theorem Zrem_sgn2 a b : 0 <= (Z.rem a b) * a.
Theorem Zrem_lt_pos a b : 0<=a -> b<>0 -> 0 <= Z.rem a b < Z.abs b.
intros; generalize (Z.rem_nonneg a b) (Z.rem_bound_abs a b); lia.
Theorem Zrem_lt_neg a b : a<=0 -> b<>0 -> -Z.abs b < Z.rem a b <= 0.
intros; generalize (Z.rem_nonpos a b) (Z.rem_bound_abs a b); lia.
Theorem Zrem_lt_pos_pos a b : 0<=a -> 0<b -> 0 <= Z.rem a b < b.
Theorem Zrem_lt_pos_neg a b : 0<=a -> b<0 -> 0 <= Z.rem a b < -b.
Theorem Zrem_lt_neg_pos a b : a<=0 -> 0<b -> -b < Z.rem a b <= 0.
Theorem Zrem_lt_neg_neg a b : a<=0 -> b<0 -> b < Z.rem a b <= 0.
Definition Remainder a b r := (0 <= a /\ 0 <= r < Z.abs b) \/ (a <= 0 /\ -Z.abs b < r <= 0).
Definition Remainder_alt a b r := Z.abs r < Z.abs b /\ 0 <= r * a.
Lemma Remainder_equiv : forall a b r, Remainder a b r <-> Remainder_alt a b r.
destruct r; simpl Z.sgn in *; lia.
Theorem Zquot_mod_unique_full a b q r : Remainder a b r -> a = b*q + r -> q = a÷b /\ r = Z.rem a b.
Theorem Zquot_unique_full a b q r : Remainder a b r -> a = b*q + r -> q = a÷b.
intros; destruct (Zquot_mod_unique_full a b q r); auto.
Theorem Zrem_unique_full a b q r : Remainder a b r -> a = b*q + r -> r = Z.rem a b.
intros; destruct (Zquot_mod_unique_full a b q r); auto.
Lemma Z_quot_pos a b : 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> 0 <= a÷b.
Lemma Z_quot_lt a b : 0 < a -> 2 <= b -> a÷b < a.
Lemma Z_quot_monotone a b c : 0<=c -> a<=b -> a÷c <= b÷c.
Lemma Z_mult_quot_le a b : 0 <= a -> 0 <= b*(a÷b) <= a.
Lemma Z_mult_quot_ge a b : a <= 0 -> a <= b*(a÷b) <= 0.
Lemma Z_quot_exact_full a b : a = b*(a÷b) <-> Z.rem a b = 0.
Theorem Zrem_le a b : 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> Z.rem a b <= a.
Theorem Zquot_le_upper_bound: forall a b q, 0 < b -> a <= q*b -> a÷b <= q.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_le_upper_bound.
Theorem Zquot_lt_upper_bound: forall a b q, 0 <= a -> 0 < b -> a < q*b -> a÷b < q.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_lt_upper_bound.
Theorem Zquot_le_lower_bound: forall a b q, 0 < b -> q*b <= a -> q <= a÷b.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_le_lower_bound.
Theorem Zquot_sgn: forall a b, 0 <= Z.sgn (a÷b) * Z.sgn a * Z.sgn b.
destruct a as [ |a|a]; destruct b as [ |b|b]; simpl; auto with zarith; unfold Z.quot; simpl; destruct N.pos_div_eucl; simpl; destruct n; simpl; auto with zarith.
Lemma Z_rem_plus : forall a b c:Z, 0 <= (a+b*c) * a -> Z.rem (a + b * c) c = Z.rem a c.
Lemma Z_quot_plus : forall a b c:Z, 0 <= (a+b*c) * a -> c<>0 -> (a + b * c) ÷ c = a ÷ c + b.
Theorem Z_quot_plus_l: forall a b c : Z, 0 <= (a*b+c)*c -> b<>0 -> b<>0 -> (a * b + c) ÷ b = a + c ÷ b.
Lemma Zquot_mult_cancel_r : forall a b c:Z, c<>0 -> (a*c)÷(b*c) = a÷b.
Lemma Zquot_mult_cancel_l : forall a b c:Z, c<>0 -> (c*a)÷(c*b) = a÷b.
Lemma Zmult_rem_distr_l: forall a b c, Z.rem (c*a) (c*b) = c * (Z.rem a b).
Lemma Zmult_rem_distr_r: forall a b c, Z.rem (a*c) (b*c) = (Z.rem a b) * c.
Theorem Zrem_rem: forall a n, Z.rem (Z.rem a n) n = Z.rem a n.
Theorem Zmult_rem: forall a b n, Z.rem (a * b) n = Z.rem (Z.rem a n * Z.rem b n) n.
Theorem Zplus_rem: forall a b n, 0 <= a * b -> Z.rem (a + b) n = Z.rem (Z.rem a n + Z.rem b n) n.
Lemma Zplus_rem_idemp_l: forall a b n, 0 <= a * b -> Z.rem (Z.rem a n + b) n = Z.rem (a + b) n.
Lemma Zplus_rem_idemp_r: forall a b n, 0 <= a*b -> Z.rem (b + Z.rem a n) n = Z.rem (b + a) n.
Lemma Zmult_rem_idemp_l: forall a b n, Z.rem (Z.rem a n * b) n = Z.rem (a * b) n.
Lemma Zmult_rem_idemp_r: forall a b n, Z.rem (b * Z.rem a n) n = Z.rem (b * a) n.
Lemma Zquot_Zquot : forall a b c, (a÷b)÷c = a÷(b*c).
Theorem Zquot_mult_le: forall a b c, 0<=a -> 0<=b -> 0<=c -> c*(a÷b) <= (c*a)÷b.
Lemma Zrem_divides : forall a b, Z.rem a b = 0 <-> exists c, a = b*c.
split; intros (c,Hc); exists c; subst; auto with zarith.
Lemma Zquot2_odd_remainder : forall a, Remainder a 2 (if Z.odd a then Z.sgn a else 0).
destruct p; simpl; auto with zarith.
destruct p; simpl; split; now auto with zarith.
Lemma Zrem_odd : forall a, Z.rem a 2 = if Z.odd a then Z.sgn a else 0.
Lemma Zrem_even : forall a, Z.rem a 2 = if Z.even a then 0 else Z.sgn a.
Lemma Zeven_rem : forall a, Z.even a = Z.eqb (Z.rem a 2) 0.
destruct a as [ |p|p]; trivial; now destruct p.
Lemma Zodd_rem : forall a, Z.odd a = negb (Z.eqb (Z.rem a 2) 0).
destruct a as [ |p|p]; trivial; now destruct p.
Theorem Zquotrem_Zdiv_eucl_pos : forall a b:Z, 0 <= a -> 0 < b -> a÷b = a/b /\ Z.rem a b = a mod b.
rewrite Z.abs_eq; auto with *; apply Z_mod_lt; auto with *.
Theorem Zquot_Zdiv_pos : forall a b, 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> a÷b = a/b.
generalize (Zquotrem_Zdiv_eucl_pos a b Ha Hb); intuition.
Theorem Zrem_Zmod_pos : forall a b, 0 <= a -> 0 < b -> Z.rem a b = a mod b.
intros a b Ha Hb; generalize (Zquotrem_Zdiv_eucl_pos a b Ha Hb); intuition.
Theorem Zrem_Zmod_zero : forall a b, b<>0 -> (Z.rem a b = 0 <-> a mod b = 0).

command: intros; generalize (Z.rem_nonneg a b) (Z.rem_bound_abs a b); lia.
intros; generalize (Z.rem_nonpos a b) (Z.rem_bound_abs a b); lia.
destruct r; simpl Z.sgn in *; lia.
intros; destruct (Zquot_mod_unique_full a b q r); auto.
intros; destruct (Zquot_mod_unique_full a b q r); auto.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_le_upper_bound.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_lt_upper_bound.
intros a b q; rewrite Z.mul_comm; apply Z.quot_le_lower_bound.
destruct a as [ |a|a]; destruct b as [ |b|b]; simpl; auto with zarith; unfold Z.quot; simpl; destruct N.pos_div_eucl; simpl; destruct n; simpl; auto with zarith.
split; intros (c,Hc); exists c; subst; auto with zarith.
destruct p; simpl; auto with zarith.
destruct p; simpl; split; now auto with zarith.
destruct a as [ |p|p]; trivial; now destruct p.
destruct a as [ |p|p]; trivial; now destruct p.
rewrite Z.abs_eq; auto with *; apply Z_mod_lt; auto with *.
generalize (Zquotrem_Zdiv_eucl_pos a b Ha Hb); intuition.
intros a b Ha Hb; generalize (Zquotrem_Zdiv_eucl_pos a b Ha Hb); intuition.
